body: Only half-orcs may select one of these traits.
name: Half-Orc Race Traits
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits

sections.body: You have worked for a crime lord, either as a low-level enforcer or as a guard, and are adept at frightening away people. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Intimidate checks, and Intimidate is always a class skill for you.
sections.name: Brute
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Brute

sections.body: Driven from town after town because of your heritage, you have become adept at living apart from others. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Survival skill checks, and Survival is always a class skill for you.
sections.name: Outcast
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Outcast
